thread.title: Odom, Kardashian ask judge to dismiss divorce case: report
thread.title_full: Odom, Kardashian ask judge to dismiss divorce case: report - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Odom, Kardashian ask judge to dismiss divorce case: report
text:
Kevin Mazur/WireImage Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom are reportedly giving their marriage another shot, according to TMZ. Lamar Odom's road to recovery might include the recovery of his marriage.
Odom and his estranged wife, Khloe Kardashian, asked a judge to dismiss their divorce case after his four-day coma, TMZ reports. Their request was granted.
The 31-year-old E! reality star's lawyer, Laura Wasser, reportedly appeared in court Wednesday morning to withdraw the papers, presenting a document both Kardashian and Odom signed â€” the latter from his hospital bed.
A judge's signature was the only obstacle standing in the way of the couple's nearly complete divorce papers, which were signed by both parties.
According to TMZ, the divorce file "is now dead."
Kevin Mazur/TCA 2010/WireImage Kardashian filed for divorce from Odom in December 2013. Kardashian, who filed for divorce in 2013, has been by Odom's bedside ever since he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel last week after a sex and drug binge. He was transferred Monday evening from Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas to Cedars-Sinai Hospital in Los Angeles.
The socialite broke her silence on his hospitalization for the first time Tuesday.
"You can never be prepared for an experience like this," she said in a statement on her website. "But without the outpouring of love and endless prayers that Lamar has received and the strength I was given from my loved ones, it would have been difficult to endure."
mjagannathan@nydailynews.com
